paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the TTR gene variant Val142Ile, its clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual case details.

patients.phenotype: síncope, cardiomyopathy, heart failure with preserved ejection fraction

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Por fim, o paciente foi submetido a teste genético, o qual confirmou mutação em heterozigose para o gene da transtirretina (TTR) do tipo Val142Ile.

functional_data.summary: The Val142Ile variant is associated with amyloidosis and cardiac symptoms.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family, as indicated by the family history of sudden death.
variants.population_frequency: The variant is prevalent in 3 to 4% of African Americans at birth, with a penetrance of approximately 20%.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical presentation and genetic confirmation.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is also known as Val122Ile.
key_quotes: Os portadores dessa mutação são, em sua maioria, afrodescendentes e homens, sendo prevalente em 3 a 4% de afroamericanos ao nascerem, com penetrância de aproximadamente 20%.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the variant was clearly described in the text.
